summary.overview: This JCL job performs administrative maintenance on a CICS system by closing multiple critical business database files to ensure proper system shutdown or maintenance procedures. The job executes CICS commands to safely close five key business files including transaction data, account information, cross-reference tables, and user security files.
business_functions: Close transaction processing file to prepare for system maintenance
Close cross-reference lookup table for data integrity
Close account data file to ensure proper file closure
Close account index file for consistent data access
Close user security file to maintain security protocols

CLOSEFIL.jcl.program_overview: System Display and Search Facility - executes CICS commands for file management operations

datasource_summary.name: SDSF Program Results Output (ISFOUT)
datasource_summary.function: Captures output results from SDSF program execution for system monitoring and command processing

datasource_summary.name: SDSF Command Results Output (CMDOUT)
datasource_summary.function: Stores results and responses from SDSF commands executed during file closure operations

datasource_summary.name: CICS File Closure Commands Input (ISFIN)
datasource_summary.function: Contains predefined CICS CEMT commands for systematically closing business files

datasource_summary.name: Transaction Data File (TRANSACT)
datasource_summary.function: Stores business transaction records and is being closed as part of system shutdown or maintenance procedures

datasource_summary.name: Cross Reference Data File (CCXREF)
datasource_summary.function: Maintains cross-reference relationships between business entities and is being closed during system maintenance

datasource_summary.name: Account Data File (ACCTDAT)
datasource_summary.function: Contains customer account information and financial data, being closed as part of end-of-day or maintenance processing

datasource_summary.name: Account Alternate Index File (CXACAIX)
datasource_summary.function: Provides alternate key access paths to account data for efficient business queries and is being closed with the main account file

datasource_summary.name: User Security Data File (USRSEC)
datasource_summary.function: Stores user authentication and authorization information for system access control, being closed during security maintenance procedures

flowchart TD
